Params[2]: The Corrupted along the exit route have been wiped out.

Params[3]: Great... that should buy us a few more days.
Maybe we can hold out until the expedition gets back...
As you can see, our Central Purification Filter had a malfunction.
Its power is dwindling at a rate of 4% per day.
And starting today, it can no longer cover the areas outside the city walls.
At this rate, Wuming city will lose its protection in two weeks' time.
It's just that the parts warehouse is located in the old city district, which was originally within the range of the Central Purification Filter.
But now that area is crawling with danger.
And so far we haven't been able to get in touch with the expedition we sent out...
Okay! I'll... wait for your good news.
